data.title: bd-16n: Auto-resolve threads when review is merged
data.description: Modified v_reviews_summary and v_threads_detail views to compute effective thread status based on parent review state. Threads on merged reviews now show as effectively resolved.

data.reason:
Security review complete. Changes are safe:

1. SQL injection: Uses parameterized queries consistently
2. Schema constraints: CHECK constraints prevent invalid status values
3. Logic: effective_status derivation is correct - thread resolved if t.status='resolved' OR r.status IN ('merged','abandoned')
4. No auth/access control changes
5. No sensitive data exposure

Tests pass (176 total, 3 new for this feature).
